column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////First stop in Chicago was Lou Malnati's. We had to experience what a real deep dish pizza tastes like! It was pretty busy since we went during lunch time
column2: but the staff were friendly and hardworking! We couldn't finish our food since they're super generous with portions
column3: so we took the rest to-go. Still tastes good when you reheat it.
